title: Free Mystery Skins
body: I am sad that I am not eligible for the free mystery skin. I have been a good boy this year but have spent too much money on Riot's game. I own too many skins and as such am not eligible for the free skin. A sad day it is on Kami's lookout.  {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
They said anyone who was not eligible for reason like this would be looked into, but only after everyone else gets their gift.

DW you still may get something.

Do you have a link to this? Not calling you a liar I just wanna read it. I submitted a ticket and she said I was ineligible for the promotion because I don't have 10 skins available (Not that every costumer support person would know every single practical).

> [{quoted}](name=HipsterVegeta,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5s2R0L2e,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-13T03:51:43.765+0000)
>I submitted a ticket and she said I was ineligible for the promotion because I don't have 10 skins available

Do you own every skin for every champ you own or something?

I own over 540 skins. I own every champion and own every legacy skin and promotional skin baring the tournament skins (I.E Champ Riven, Victorious Ryze) and also Season 1 and Season 2 Ranked skins but none of those are available through mystery gifting so as far as eligible skins goes I only have 9.
I had them all before all the new ones came out all at once. I was busy during the holidays haha I will regain my title as having everything in the store!

El Tigre Braum will come out with Challenger Ahri soon, so they may reconsider your gifting once those skins are on live servers. If you don't mind me asking, what are the nine skins that you do not own?

Newer ones that have come out in quick succession. 

Blood Moon Thresh and Elise, Etermum Rek'Sai, Captain Volibear, Safecracker Evelynn, Battlecast Kog'Maw, Battlecast Alpha Skarner, and Blood Moon Kallista.

People who weren't eligible for the skin (due to reasons such as yours) may be getting something. I don't have a link because I read the post like last week and I am not spending my day searching through this forum for you, but I promise you Riot did mention people in situations like yours. Once all the gifts have been sent out (which was suppose to be complete around this time) they are going to first make sure that all players eligible did in fact recieve gifts, and then they are going to look at the players who were ineligible due to already owning too many skins and go from there. 

Have faith my friend, you'll hear something about it soon I'm sure.
I wish I had money like that.. i'm still struggling to get a shyvana skin! xD I spend all my money on taco bell and mountain dew... i'm a bottomless pit
I still didn't get my mystery skin and I meet all the requirements
